  4#define VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_HISTO_HPP

  6#include <vsip/support.hpp>
  7#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
  8#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
  9#include <vsip/core/dispatch.hpp>
 10#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 11# include <vsip/opt/dispatch.hpp>
 12# ifdef VSIP_IMPL_CBE_SDK
 13#  include <vsip/opt/cbe/ppu/signal.hpp>
 14# endif
 15#endif
 16
 17namespace vsip
 18{
 19namespace impl
 20{
 21template <typename T>
 22inline index_type
 23hist_bin(T min, T max, T delta, length_type num, T value)
 24{
 25  if (value < min) return 0;
 26  else if (value >= max) return num - 1;
 27  else return (index_type)(((value - min) / delta) + 1);
 28} 
 29
 30template <dimension_type D>
 31struct Histogram_accumulator;
 32
 33template <>
 34struct Histogram_accumulator<1>
 35{
 36  template <typename T, typename HBlock, typename DBlock>
 37  static void exec(T min, T max, HBlock &hist, DBlock const &input)
 38  {
 39    length_type num = hist.size();
 40    T delta = (max - min) / (num - 2);
 41
 42    for (index_type i = 0; i < input.size(1, 0); ++i)
 43    {
 44      index_type n = hist_bin(min, max, delta, num, input.get(i));
 45      hist.put(n, hist.get(n) + 1);
 46    }
 47  }
 48};
 49
 50template <>
 51struct Histogram_accumulator<2>
 52{
 53  template <typename T, typename HBlock, typename DBlock>
 54  static void exec(T min, T max, HBlock &hist, DBlock const &input)
 55  {
 56    length_type num = hist.size();
 57    T delta = (max - min) / (num - 2);
 58
 59    for (index_type i = 0; i < input.size(2, 0); ++i)
 60      for (index_type j = 0; j < input.size(2, 1); ++j)
 61      {
 62	index_type n = hist_bin(min, max, delta, num, input.get(i, j));
 63	hist.put(n, hist.get(n) + 1);
 64      }
 65  }
 66};
 67} // namespace vsip::impl
 68} // namespace vsip
 69
 70namespace vsip_csl
 71{
 72namespace dispatcher
 73{
 74#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 75template<>
 76struct List<op::hist>
 77{
 78  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 79			 be::cbe_sdk,
 80			 be::generic>::type type;
 81};
 82#endif
 83
 84template <typename T, typename HBlock, typename DBlock>
 85struct Evaluator<op::hist, be::generic, void(T, T, HBlock &, DBlock const &)>
 86{
 87  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 88  static bool rt_valid(T, T, HBlock &, DBlock const &) { return true;}
 89
 90  static void exec(T min, T max, HBlock &hist, DBlock const &input)
 91  {
 92    vsip::impl::Histogram_accumulator<DBlock::dim>::exec(min, max, hist, input);
 93  }
 94};
 95
 96} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
 97} // namespace vsip_csl
 98
 99namespace vsip
100{
101
102
103template <template <typename, typename> class const_View = const_Vector,
104          typename T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE>
105class Histogram
106{
107  typedef Dense<1, int> hist_block_type;
108public:
109  // Constructor and destructor [signal.histo.constructors]
110  Histogram(T min_value, T max_value, length_type num_bin)
111    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
112    : min_(min_value),
113      max_(max_value),
114      hist_(num_bin, 0)
115  {
116    assert(min_ < max_);
117    assert(num_bin >= 3);
118  }
119
120  /// This constructor, albeit not required by the VSIPL++ spec, is
121  /// necessary to implement the C-VSIPL bindings. They allow an external
122  /// view to be used to accumulate the histogram values over multiple
123  /// calls outside any persistent Histogram<> object / state.
124  template <typename Block>
125  Histogram(T min_value, T max_value, const_Vector<int, Block> hist)
126    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
127    : min_(min_value),
128      max_(max_value),
129      hist_(hist.size())
130  {
131    assert(min_ < max_);
132    assert(hist_.size() >= 3);
133    hist_ = hist;
134  }
135
136  ~Histogram() VSIP_NOTHROW
137  {}
138
139  // Histogram operators [signal.histo.operators]
140  template <typename Block>
141  const_Vector<scalar_i>
142  operator()(const_Vector<T, Block> input, bool accumulate = false)
143    VSIP_NOTHROW
144  {
145    namespace d = vsip_csl::dispatcher;
146
147    if (accumulate == false) hist_ = 0;
148
149#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
150    Evaluator<d::op::hist, be::generic, void(T, T, hist_block_type &, Block const&)>::
151      exec(min_, max_, hist_.block(), input.block());
152#else
153    vsip_csl::dispatch<d::op::hist, void, T, T, hist_block_type &, Block const &>
154      (min_, max_, hist_.block(), input.block());
155#endif
156    return hist_;
157  }
158
159  template <typename Block>
160  const_Vector<scalar_i>
161  operator()(const_Matrix<T, Block> input, bool accumulate = false)
162    VSIP_NOTHROW
163  {
164    namespace d = vsip_csl::dispatcher;
165
166    if (accumulate == false) hist_ = 0;
167
168#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
169    Evaluator<d::op::hist, be::generic, void(T, T, hist_block_type &, Block const&)>::
170      exec(min_, max_, hist_.block(), input.block());
171#else
172    vsip_csl::dispatch<d::op::hist, void, T, T, hist_block_type &, Block const &>
173      (min_, max_, hist_.block(), input.block());
174#endif
175
176    return hist_;
177  }
178
179private:
180  T min_;
181  T max_;
182  Vector<scalar_i> hist_;
183};
184
185} // namespace vsip
